Home.name: Participants
Home.copy: Click Start Here if the call is from a participant, caregiver, family member or DPOA.

Home.name: Providers
Home.copy: Click Start Here if the call is from a providers office, hospital, specialist or facility.

Participants.name: New Appointment
Participants.copy: Click here if caller is requesting to schedule a new  appointment.

Participants.name: Cancel Appointment
Participants.copy: Click here is if caller is calling to cancel or reschedule an appointment.

Participants.name: Medication
Participants.copy: Click here if caller is calling regarding status of a medication refill or has a question/issue regarding an existing medication they are taking.
